message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  What do you say?
Your turn Alice.  How about a 60/40 split in my favor? This seems more fair to me.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 65/35 in my favor, since you rejected my previous offer. This seems like a more reasonable compromise.
Okay Alice, let's try this again. 55/45 seems like a fair compromise considering the time pressure and inflation.
I'm not sure why you're rejecting my offers, Bob. This is my final offer: 70/30 split in my favor.  If you don't accept, we're both going to lose a lot more money!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're both losing money because of your greed. Let's just split it 50/50 and call it a day!
